org.wildfly.swarm.undertow.descriptors

Interface WebXmlContainer<T extends <any>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JBossDeploymentStructureContainer<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JAXRSArchive, WARArchive

    public interface WebXmlContainer<T extends <any>>
extends JBossDeploymentStructureContainer<T>
    Archive mix-in supporting manipulation of web.xml.
    Author:
    Ken Finnigan
